title: Simulation Game-Based Hand Hygiene Education for Healthcare Professional Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Healthcare Management Knowledge and Infection Control Concepts
context.additional_context: Intensive training emphasizing game participation motivation and practical applicability for learners in managerial/leadership roles

learning_goals: Perform key steps of hand hygiene procedures with 90% accuracy through simulation games
In team-based scenarios, identify infection risk situations and determine appropriate hand hygiene measures
Based on in-game feedback, propose three or more hand hygiene strategies applicable to real medical settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
